name: Unthread - Windows Edition
description:
Unthread is a Horror-Lowpoly adventure, created and developed by Kenalt Games. 

Uthread is a very light 3d game, also suitable for those PCs that do not have video cards dedicated to gaming. 

Unthread is also avaible on Play Store, play it wherever you want!

If you like the game follow us on Twitter! :D

https://twitter.com/GamesKenalt
